title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

title: Creed
description: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is offered a chance to have his criminal history erased if he can successfully infiltrate a target's subconscious.
